news_header: Four women urge the US not to interfere in Andrew Tate's Romanian case regarding serious allegations.
news_original_title: US must not interfere in Tate's case, say alleged victims
news_text: Four women who allege sexual abuse by Andrew Tate have expressed concern over US interference in his Romanian legal case. They urge the US to respect Romania's judicial process. Tate and his brother face serious allegations, which they deny. The women feel traumatized by US support for Tate.
